archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0945
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing analyst, I require the ability to be able to bulk load debits and credits against 1 or many accounts

properties.value: Can you please expain what do you mean by debit and credit? Comarch will need to prepare mechanism for manual/automatic loading debits/credits for single account or set of accounts.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
